name: Marco Cheng's Resume
body:
### Objective
Looking for an opportunity to utilize my web development knowledge and experience.

***

### Work experience
* _Application Development Intern, Russell Investments, Seattle_
 + Renewed a legacy website from ASP to ASP.Net 
 + Implemented search function and design front-end UI to support different data set using multiple JavaScript libraries 
 + Developed RESTful Web APIs with Swagger framework     
**_Outcome:_**
        *     New UI for data maintenance tool to shorten the data uploading process 

### Relevant Projects
* iOS
 + ["Vision Screener"](https://youtu.be/jmLb0rbxReM)
 + ["U-park"](https://github.com/mkpc/Parking-UW)
 + ["CARMAX"](https://invis.io/Y375TFZSJ)
* Web Application
 * ["Lean Angle Calculator"](http://students.washington.edu/mkpc/info474/info474_lean_angle/) 
 * ["CNN Web Crawler"](https://github.com/mkpc/INFO344) 
 * ["Ecocommuter"](http://students.washington.edu/mkpc/info343/final-project/INFO343-FinalProject/#1)
 * ["Seattle Traffic Camera"](http://students.washington.edu/mkpc/info343/traffic-cam-challenge/)
* Console Application
 * ["iPhone Stock Checker"] (https://github.com/mkpc/iPhoneStockChecker)

***

### Education
_University of Washington   2013 - 2016_    
Bachelor of Science in Informatics- HCI   GPA: 3.7

_Seattle Central College   2011 - 2013_    
Associate of Science Degree

### Skills and Languages
* C#, Java, JavaScript, Swift, Html5, PHP, CSS
* Visual Studio 2015, WebStorm, VSCode
* Visual Paradigm, Axure, Microsoft Visio, InVision, Pixate Studio 
* Amazon Web Service, Microsoft Azure 
* Git, SourceTree, Team City
* Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio, MySQL
* Jasmine, SpecFlow, NUnit
